title: Reusable Shower Cap for Women – Leakproof, Nonslip Hair Cap for Shower w/ Comfy Flexiband – Soft, Breathable Shower Caps for Women Reusable Waterproof – Durable, Heavy Duty Shower Cap by SMPL OBJECTS (Marble)
features: DON’T RISK RUINING YOUR HAIRSTYLE with LEAKY plastic hair caps that DON’T FIT. The SMPL OBJECTS Shower Cap is uniquely designed with our LEAKPROOF, nonslip silicone Forehead Strip, keeping your waterproof shower cap SECURELY IN PLACE without leaving creases. Made to fit head sizes up to a 24” circumference, this hair shower cap features our elastic Flexiband for THE PERFECT COMFY FIT.

THE AVERAGE SHOWER HAIR CAP is poorly made with flimsy materials, FALLING APART after a few uses. Crafted out of DURABLE, 100% waterproof polyester with a LIGHTWEIGHT, BREATHABLE feel, our washable shower cap is SOFT TO THE TOUCH and resistant to wrinkling & tearing. So you can count on it for LONG-LASTING PROTECTION against moisture – and say buh-bye to the WASTEFUL CYCLE of plastic hair caps.

MAKE EVERY SHOWER A LUXURY – Our quality-made womens shower caps help MAINTAIN YOUR BLOWOUT, natural curls, or whatever hairstyle you rock by LOCKING OUT MOISTURE in the shower. Not only will your follicles benefit from LESS FREQUENT WASHINGS, our shower bonnet will also eliminate the EXTRA TOUCH-UPS you would normally have to do post-shower – SAVING TIME, and saving your mane from EXCESS HEAT.

THE ULTIMATE BEAUTY GIFT – in a CHIC, CHARMING PACKAGE. In your choice of 5 VIBRANT PATTERNS, this shower cap for long hair, medium hair, and short hair has a gorgeous retro look that’s SLEEK & STREAMLINED compared to other bulky hair caps for women. Our head cap bonnets make perfect STOCKING STUFFERS, White Elephant gifts, birthday gifts for Mom, or centerpieces for a luxurious SPA GIFT BASKET!

At SMPL OBJECTS, we believe self-care is essential to your wellness and beauty – inside and out. As a woman-owned, woman-operated business based in Toronto, we make our reusable shower caps with only the best materials and craftsmanship. Your satisfaction is our top priority. If you don’t love your adult shower cap, our team is standing by to help.FRIENDLY: Go green with this washable, reusable shower cap that helps protect the environment.
